plot outline: Vasu, an old retired army man is diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease and his Radha finds it hard to handle him and his childlike nature during some times. They go through some unexpected problems in their house during a rainy season in Chennai.
title: House Owner
plot: An elderly couple, a house wife and a retired army man, go through some unanticipated moments during a rainy season in Chennai.

Vasu, an old retired army man is diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease and his Radha finds it hard to handle him and his childlike nature during some times. They go through some unexpected problems in their house during a rainy season in Chennai.::Santhosh
